mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Shift the Gears", "Hayride", and "Eight Rollaway". ROUND DANCES "Merry Widow Waltz", and "Hayloft Schottische". SPECIAL FEATURES "Comes the Summer and...?", "Japanese Square Dance Magazine", "Autos and Allemandes", and "Summer Institute". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Women on the Square", "Square of the Month", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "On the Record", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
